Savanna

VCHA

Introduction

Savanna (사바나) is an American singer, dancer, and rapper under JYP Entertainment. She is a member of the girl group VCHA formed by the survival show "A2K" under JYP Entertainment. She debuted in VCHA on January 26, 2024, with their first single album 'Girls of the Year".

Fun facts

1
She has been a dancer and gymnast her whole life. She did gymnastics competitively for 7 years until she was forced to stop due to an injury.
…
2
Savanna's special skills are being able to hold a handstand for a long time and learning dances super-fast.
